content: NEW YORK  March 23 Several major banks were hit on Monday with lawsuits filed by California-based analog circuits maker Maxim Integrated Products Inc alleging their smartphone banking apps infringe the company's patents.
name: Maxim Integrated Products Inc
title: Maxim Integrated Products targets top banks with patent lawsuits
